infoText2: We are also looking for people outside the EU
aboutText1: Staffing agency for employment not only in Poland, but also in the Czech Republic and Slovakia.
aboutText2: We are a team of young and experienced specialists who provide employment to dozens of people in Europe every day.
aboutText3: Lintar PL Sp z o.o., has been operating on the Polish market since 2020
aboutText4: LINTAR s.r.o. has been operating on the Czech market since 2018
